title: NO, NO, IT'S NOT AN EASY ROAD

sections.title: Verse 1
content: No, no, it's not an easy road,
But I must walk it every day;

sections.title: Verse 2
content: There are hills I must climb upward,
And valleys I must pass along the way.

sections.title: Chorus
content: But I know my Lord is with me,
He will never let me stray;
